languages.text: Deals <u>(from 20 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and an additional 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Наносит <u>(от 20 до 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 45%, а также 30 психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Deals 10 Piercing damage with 20 armour penetration within the area.
If a target has suffered at least 1 damage from this grenade, it also suffer 12 mental damage.

Deals <u>(from 20 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and an additional 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Deals <u>(from 20 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and an additional 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

All targets in a 1-cell radius of the epicentre of the explosion suffer <u>from 20 to 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}, with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target does not {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade, they also suffer 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Наносит <u>(от 20 до 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 45%, а также 30 психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: Deals <u>(from 20 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and an additional 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Наносит <u>(от 20 до 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 45%, а также 30 психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

Наносит 10 пронзающего урона по области. Пробитие брони составляет 20%.
Получив хотя бы 1 урон от взрыва гранаты, цель также получает 12 психического урона.

Наносит <u>(от 20 до 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 45%, а также 30 психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
